intro: Gouinia virgata var. robusta, commonly known as the robust gouinia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Malvaceae family and is characterized by its large, palmate leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers. The plant thrives in humid, well-drained soils and requires full sun to partial shade for optimal growth. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its striking foliage and vibrant floral display. Gouinia virgata var. robusta is also valued in traditional medicine for its potential therapeutic properties.
